data.title: Size Does Matter (...for rooms)
data.text:
:) Is 209 square feet a decent size for a double? Just saw the floorplans for my Southgate floor…

Anyway, share your room size if you know it!

Yeah, I would also really like to know where you guys found floor plans. Could anyone please post the floor plans for Gilbert-Addoms? Could anyone give a rough estimate of the average size of a single in East Campus, what about a single in Gilbert-Addoms?

I think RLHS takes those down after roompix is over. I couldn’t find them when I was looking this summer but they were definitely up earlier this spring.

Edit: nvm, it looks like RLHS posts floorplans for west/central campuses. I guess I wasn’t looking hard enough :-/

but if you go to their website, you can see pictures of dorms on east

http://rlhs.studentaffairs.duke.edu/newstudents/index.html</a></p>

When clicking on the link this is what appears:

An Error Has Occured

The page you requested can’t be found. If you typed the URL in directly, please confirm that you have the correct URL. If you got here via a link on another page, please consider reporting this error to the webmaster of the site where the link is.

Please note that we have recently updated our site, so it is possible the item for which you are looking has just moved. Please return to our home page and see if you can find it from there. If you continue to have problems, please feel free to contact us.

D was finally able to access the plans for floors 2 through 5. Boy, some of those floor plans don’t even look like they can fit the 6 foot bed frames and then some doubles have walk in closets about 3/4 the size of some of the singles.
